html:
1.24.24  3:54 pm   do you have any tips about soap?

      sure. it works well with water

1.24.24  12:57 pm   like a lot of people, i hold my music to a really high standard, and i feel like if it isn't approaching perfection then nobody will think it sounds 'good enough'. it's really demotivating. what's your strategy for dealing with stuff like this?

      well first of all, i doubt anyone even likes perfect music. but also, it doesn't exist. perfection implies a specific objective, and a ceiling for how close to possibly acheive it. even if the specific objective of music is to 'make people feel good', there's no limit to how high that goes, or the amount of ways it can be done. so instead of 'converging' on a single best solution, instead it 'diverges'

1.24.24  12:14 pm   I'm at school right now and failing math, should I quit? :3

      that depends on many other details of your life situation

1.24.24  11:19 am   Do you hate the fact that you need food and water to survive?

      in some ways yes. in other ways no

1.24.24  11:02 am   how to always have a passion to learn something?

      it sounds like you are telling me that you want to want something. and the more i think about that, the less i understand how that could possibly be the case

1.24.24  9:45 am   would you rather feel every atom, or see every photon? or maybe just a fraction of a percent of both?

      i would like to view individual atoms and photons occasionally

1.24.24  9:44 am   I am a writer but not of songs. Should I keep a journal for inspiration? Write down whatever comes to mind in a little notebook throughout my day?

     sure

      Is this a useless exercise?

     no

1.24.24  9:17 am   cereal or milk first

      cereal was first but that's just because i tend to read from left to right

1.24.24  7:45 am   Why is a combination of a voice and an acoustic guitar so good?

      because the person doing it can do it good. and the reason the instrument allows for this is because it is fully equipped for harmony and rhythm, with only 2 hands, while also comfortably holding the instrument

1.24.24  7:40 am   Picture this: You are a human. What do you do next?

      go to lunch

1.24.24  7:04 am   would you like to try meth?

      no

1.24.24  4:58 am   do you like garfield the cat

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.24.24  4:34 am   Is there anything you know but that you can't prove?

      yes

1.24.24  4:18 am   Is new canaan in pennsylvania or is pennsylvania in new canaan

      i think neither

1.24.24  3:33 am   how many times in your life have you looked at the clock at exactly 2:44 (am or pm doesn't matter)

      probably about 500

1.24.24  12:34 am   Do you ever feel like it's you against the world

      i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

1.24.24  12:26 am   if a tomato potatos potatoes and a tomato tomatos tomatoes who potatoes tomatoes

     you may have to do it

1.24.24  12:07 am   Should I put all of my focus into one thing, sacrificing the experience of many things? Or should I put my focus into many, sacrificing the mastery of one?

      surely there will be due time for both

1.23.24  11:04 pm   thoughts on therapists?

      sometimes i imagine therapists talking to each other

1.23.24  7:32 pm   is it illegal to make laws?

      i guess it depends if you're the one who made the previous laws

1.23.24  7:29 pm   what's your favorite season???

      the next one

1.23.24  5:29 pm   why are oranges called oranges but apples arent called red

      you've misinterpreted the causality of the orange scenario. the fruit was named orange first. the color 'orange' is named after the fruit. so perhaps in this case you might wonder why there is no color called 'apple'. although i suspect there is

1.23.24  5:20 pm   have these questions ever helped your creativity?

      they continue to challenge it

1.23.24  4:54 pm   if my cat is cold would a microwave fix that

      yes but it would cause much more significant problems

1.23.24  4:40 pm   What is your opinion?

      which one

1.23.24  4:38 pm   why do you like the drums?

      could come in handy

1.23.24  3:45 pm   What's your favorite cheese?

      venezuelen beaver cheese

1.23.24  2:34 pm   will you post the final drafts of the scripts for your previous four videos somewhere on this website?

      yes

1.23.24  2:31 pm   So, on a couple of my guitars I have this issue where each string doesn't stay in tune when I move up the neck... like if I were to play an open E, then play the 12th fret on the same string, the octave is out of tune with the open string. I thought it was maybe the strings themselves were just old (they were), but I changed the strings recently... and I'm still having the same issue. Is my neck warped or something like that?

     yes

     Is my guitar just fucked at this point? 

     only temporarily. this is quite a normal problem that can be fixed by a guitar service professional, who will likely begin by looking at the guitar longways in that iconic luthier pose

1.23.24  1:06 pm   how to use a barometer?

      set it and forget it. the thing uses itself

1.23.24  1:00 pm   Do you feel as though running this open forum questions page has taught you anything specific/concrete about mankind? If so, what?

      yes. it's good

1.23.24  11:29 am   How to stop the world from spinning 

      you'll have to spin yourself at an equal pace in the opposite direction

1.23.24  10:55 am   how am i supposed to stay on track while making music? i find myself getting distracted or not having the motivation some days

      one of 2 things: you'll either have to want it more, or do it simpler

1.23.24  10:50 am   what if the world exploded

      that would be a real mess huh

1.23.24  9:49 am   opinions on donkey kong?

      used to be called monkey kong

1.23.24  9:48 am   If I have a godfather, am I a demigod?

      maybe but not for that reason

1.23.24  8:34 am   what was the most interesting place you been to?

      i'm sorry to admit that i have not ranked the places i've been in order of interestingness. i have, however, listed them in chronological order, which is more meaningful for me

1.23.24  7:38 am   True or False: All roads lead to Rome

      false. some of them lead away from rome

1.23.24  5:48 am   Bill are you human

      well that would explain some of these absurd cravings, for things such as food and drink

1.23.24  4:57 am   how do i talk to people?

     i have no idea, but it's similar to what you're doing here, writing this

     or how do i get rid of the feeling that i'm obligated to talk to people

      i have no idea. perhaps you are not

1.23.24  1:13 am   is there any point in listing the potentially infinite

      yes, it's fun, good exercise, and you'll never run out of things

1.23.24  1:10 am   I think im dumb

      prove it

1.23.24  12:55 am   how much should someone learn before they know enough?

      it doesn't matter. any amount is enough. then you can learn more anyway just for fun

1.23.24  12:55 am   how would you get out of a creative rut?

      start making a list of all the things anyone else has ever done

1.23.24  12:44 am   why is it so much easier to create music than to do my homework, even though creating music probably takes more mental energy than doing my homework

      because it's what you want to do

1.23.24  12:11 am   please give me new music, bill, i beg you!!!

      i will do it

1.23.24  12:00 am   Do you like M&M Minis

      i don't recall the existence of m&m minis. now you've got me wondering how small they are, because normal m&m's already seem quite small to me

1.22.24  11:09 pm   Which layer of the earth are you planning to go to? What are you planning to find?

      i will remain on the crust for a while longer still

1.22.24  10:15 pm   what's your favorite chess opening?

      a2-a4

1.22.24  9:50 pm   What was the question Damien Maymdien skipped in "maybe i could eat blades of grass"?

      all of them
